stimulusHtml: Joseph Mallord William Turner's Slave Ship (Slavers Throwing Overboard the Dead and Dying, Typhoon Coming On) exemplifies the Romantic era through its
choicesHtml: emphasis on color as a means of eliciting intense emotion
pairing of textual information with the visual via its long, specific title
focus on a contemporary event as an antislavery statement
attention to the overlooked genre of seascapes at sunset
